Ceccy Abena Ampratwum (onye a mụrụ n'abalị iri na atọ nke ọnwa Nọvemba), nke a maara nke ọma site na aha otutu nkwago ya bụ Ceccy Twum, bụ onye Ghana na-agụ egwu ozioma na onye na-ede egwu.
A mụrụ Ceccy n'ezinụlọ Maazị na Oriakụ Andoh bi na Accra, Ghana

Ọ lụrụ onye amụma Alex Twum ma ha mụrụ ụmụaka atọ. Ceccy Twum malitere agụmakwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị ya na Don Bosco Catholic Primary na Junior high na Winneba wee gaa Snapps College maka agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị ya na Accra.
Ceccy Twum wepụtara abọm mbụ ya Me Gyefo ne Yesu n'afọ 2005, nke mere ka ọ pụta ìhè n'akụm egwu

Ya na ọtụtụ ndị egwu ozioma, gụnyere Mercy Chinwo, Joe Mettle, Ohemaa Mercy, MOG Music, Joyce Blessing, Nathaniel Bassey, Sinach, Frank Edwards, Empress Gifty Ceccy nwere ọtụtụ egwu kporo ekpo gụnyere Victory, Di Wo Hene, Your Grace, Amen

N'afọ 2018, egwu ya bụ Jehovah nwetere ya nhọpụta ya na Vodafone Ghana Music Awards dị ka abụ Oziọma nke afọ A họpụtakwara ya na nhọpụta Artiste Of Excellence West Africa na African Music And Media Awards
Ceccy na-akwado ihe omume Oziọma kwa afọ nke akpọrọ Gold Worship nke na-achịkọta ndị kwere ekwe si n'akụkụ niile nke ndụ iji fekọọ ofufe ọnụ.
